title: Looking to purchase these tobacco cards
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Looking to purchase these tobacco cards
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Tony N.
I am currently looking to purchase the following tobacco cards graded by SGC only:

- T202 Cobb/Jennings "Cobb Steals Third" around a SGC 40 or 50

- T206 Ty Cobb Green Background,with a Piedmont back around a SGC 40

- T204 Ramly Eddie Plank SGC 20 or 30

If you have any of these cards for sale and are willing to sell them, please email me scans of the front and back and your price.

Thanks,
Tony
